headline: NFP Appoints Jack Spencer, SVP, Property and Casualty, Strengthening Its Commercial Risk Business in the Northeast
summary: NFP, an Aon company and leading property and casualty (P&C) broker and benefits consultant, today announced the addition of Jack Spencer as senior vice president, Commercial Risk, in its Northeast region. Based in West Hartford, CT, Spencer will report to Lauren Kim, managing director, P&C, Northeast.
